title: PHP/Laravel Developer
description: 🚀 We’re Hiring: Laravel Developer (Onsite – Multan Office | Company Based in Spain)We’re looking for a skilled and experienced Laravel Developer to join our Multan-based team.Our head office is located in Spain, and we’re expanding our operations in Pakistan.If you have strong
requirements: Strong command over Laravel Framework (PHP)Must have experience in developing Management Systems (HR, Inventory, School, CRM, Accounting, etc.)Deep understanding of MVC architecture and database design (MySQL)Ability to create RESTful APIs and handle backend logic & admin panelsExperience with authentication systems (roles & permissions)Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript/jQueryFamiliar with Git / GitHub and version controlMinimum 3–4 years of experience (5 years preferred)Onsite position – Multan office💰 Salary Package:60,000 – 80,000 PKR (Monthly) — based on experience and project capability.⚠ Important:Only apply if you are based in MultanThis is a full-time onsite position📩 To Apply:Send your CV, portfolio / GitHub link, and recent Laravel projects to:👉 hire@nmsofttechnologies.com or ‪+92 307-6032042‬If you can build powerful, user-friendly management systems using Laravel, this is your chance to join an international company and grow with us! 🌍🔥 Show more Show less
skills: ['expertise in Laravel and can build any type of Management System efficiently — we want you on our team! 💻']
